text: One-Line Sky or Single Line Sky refers to the landform of a narrow passage between huge rocks, where the sky looks like a single line. It is a word often used in China and the Chinese cultural sphere. One-Line Sky: A Landform Often Seen in the Mountains (Baidu Encyclopedia) (Chinese) One-Line Sky is found in the following areas: * Huangshan, Anhui Province * Wuyi Mountains, Fujian Province * Shoushan, Kaohsiung, Taiwan etc. ==See also== *Slot canyon ==References== Category:Landforms Category:Geography of China
title: One-Line Sky
